comment: I'll give this hop schedule a try.  Great Lakes uses Harrington Two Row. I've found Rahr at Northern Brewer. They also use Wyeast 1028, London Ale.  There's a couple good sites/docs I found discussing: http://www.thebeerists.com/shownotes/TheBeerists-0034-Notes.pdf and an interview with their pub brewer: http://bit.ly/1hORT5B
